SearchMe

About this project

This is a SearchMe App using HTML5, SASS, Vanilla Javascript, and the Wikipedia API (https://en.wikipedia.org/w/api.php). The layout of the Search Me app looks very similar to the Google search engine. Users can get up to 20 top search results returned by the Wikipedia API.
